title: Better connections with trams and more bus services for Route 732
articleContent:
From Sunday 11 April 2021 changes will be made to the timetable for bus Route 732 - Box Hill - Upper Ferntree Gully via Vermont South. The changes will improve bus connections with tram Route 75 and, for most services, allow passengers to transfer between buses and trams within 3-8 minutes at the Vermont South tram Terminus.

The new timetable brings 348 more bus services to the route each week.

Services will run with a similar frequency as the current timetable and will be more consistent.

To allocate more bus services at times when passengers need them most, the route will operate between 5.30am and 12am on Monday to Friday, 6am and 12am on Saturday and 6.30am and 12am on Sunday.

View the new 732 timetable.

To plan your journey, visit the Journey planner or order a printed copy of a timetable by calling 1800 800 007.
